articles.description: The nimble king of flatpicking had enormous influence on a host of prominent musicians. And he could sing, too, until he could no longer.
articles.content: Mr. Rice joined J.D. Crowe and the New South in 1971. Three years later, Mr. Skaggs signed on as well, replacing Mr. Rices brother Larry in the group. The dobro player Jerry Douglas also become a mem… [+1384 chars]

articles.title: Mariah Carey's 'Christmas' Back Atop Hot 100, As Dean Martin, Wham! & Chuck Berry Hit Top 10 - Billboard
articles.description: Mariah Carey's "All I Want for Christmas Is You" returns to No. 1, from No. 2, on the Billboard Hot 100 songs chart for a fifth total week on top.
articles.content: Carey's "Christmas," on Columbia Records/Legacy Recordings, drew 54.9 million U.S. streams (up 35%) and sold 12,000 downloads (up 24%) in the week ending Dec. 24, according to Nielsen Music/MRC Data.… [+7875 chars]
